Meet Our Team

The Cyber Safety Lab at Gyeongsang National University is led by Professor Jin Hyun Kim and consists of Master’s students, Undergraduate Researchers, and Alumni. We focus on AI Safety, Autonomous Driving, Medical AI, and Formal Methods for Cyber-Physical Systems.

Advisor

Jin Hyun Kim

Associate Professor, AI Information Engineering, Gyeongsang National University

jin.kim@gnu.ac.kr

Research Areas:
Formal Methods · LLM Truthworthines · AI Safety · Medical AI · Autonomous Robot AI
